item.title: your connection deserves a name
item.description: tl;dr: When your app interacts with an external system (e.g., a datastore), assign a name to the connection. The goal should be: the external system knows who you are. During an incident, it will reduce the time to debug by multiple hours and often save other applications from failing. Check out andygrunwald/your-connection-deserves-a-name @ Github for code examples how to do it.
